definition: ability/talent/sb of a certain type/a capable individual/only/only then/just now
can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy

sentences.english: Only God radiates at level seven.
sentences.chinese: 只有上帝才能達到第七級。

sentences.english: How can I rebuild my trust in him?
sentences.chinese: 怎樣才能重新建立起我對他的信任？

sentences.english: Practitioners should be required to log in to the app before it can be used.
sentences.chinese: 從業人員應須在登錄到該應用程序才能使用。

sentences.english: We are looking for energetic candidates with good caliber to join Shanghai Representative Office.
sentences.chinese: 我們誠聘充滿活力及有才能的人士加入上海代表處。

sentences.english: But how can I apply to practice?
sentences.chinese: 但是我如何才能運用於實踐呢？

sentences.english: Before you can minister to anyone, you must first be able to minister to your heavenly Father.
sentences.chinese: 你必須先服事你在天上的父，才能去服事別人。

sentences.english: We must work hard to forget that I love to search for you.
sentences.chinese: 要多努力才能忘記讓我愛到深入骨髓的你。

sentences.english: And then you go forward on that basis.
sentences.chinese: 承認了錯誤，才能繼續前進。

sentences.english: Damon combines his moviemaking talents with his desire to help others.
sentences.chinese: 戴蒙將製作電影的才能和幫助他人的慾望結合在一起。

sentences.english: But how could we disguise the fact that I was not [even] fifteen years old?
sentences.chinese: 可我們怎麼才能掩飾我還不到15足歲的事實呢？

sentences.english: That is what revs his engine.
sentences.chinese: 這才能使他的發動機運轉。

sentences.english: Consult personal sites only when you are convinced of their reliability.
sentences.chinese: 只有在您確信個人網站的可靠性後才能利用它們。

sentences.english: Then, the language teaching can the whole innovation.
sentences.chinese: 只有這樣，語文教學才能整體立異。

sentences.english: When your hair became white, then, i can know , you are mine.
sentences.chinese: 當你鬢已成霜，我才能確定你是我的。

sentences.english: It need quite a long time return to the former stability after rain, 5.
sentences.chinese: 降雨過後相當長時間，滑坡才能恢復到雨前的穩定性。

definition: a moment ago/just now/(indicating sth happening later than expected)/(preceded by a clause of condition or reason) not until/(followed by a numerical clause) only
to be capable of/to be able to/can
important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if
can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy
able to/so that sb can/enabling/in order to/finally in a position to/with sth in view
